name: INGVAR: Totems of the Mithrwan
description:
Venture into an atmospheric wilderness in this short narrative driven adventure set in an early Nordic village. Collect the gods powers and avoid the evil that hunts you.

  • A narrative-driven, single-player adventure
  • A beautiful atmospheric forested mountainous environment.
  • A nice short relaxing game to play within half an hour
  • Beautiful music to put you right in the mood

This game was made in a little over 7 days with the help of David Wehle's "Game Dev Unlocked" course.

  1. Download the .zip file via the button below
  2. Go to where you downloaded the file (default is "Downloads" folder)
  3. Right click the .zip file and click on "Extract All" in the new menu
  4. The new folder should open automatically (if not manually open the folder with the same name as the .zip file)
  5. Find the "INGVAR Totems of the Mithrwan.exe" file
  6. Double click it and enjoy the game!

This game uses mouse and keyboard controls found in most FPS titles

Move Character: W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys

Move Camera : Mouse

Sprint : Left Shift

Note: Controller functionality isn't directly supported, but some movement may work based on Unity's default Input Manager settings. For best experience use mouse and keyboard.
